EmailTemplate.name: 07-15-21 BNK Connect e-Zine follow up LATAM.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: CONNECT: Don’t miss out on our latest magazine to stay ahead
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’re reaching out again to make sure you don’t miss our latest CONNECT magazine. It covers how changing consumer behaviours, on top of payment and technology evolutions, continue to disrupt banking. Find out what the current and future trends are for financial institutions across the globe in our latest issue of CONNECT magazine. Learn more about: - What digital-first means - Cloud and API developments - Protecting your ATMs - Thoughts from our customers and analysts including Royal Bank of Canada and RBR ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
